attr.title: OpenEnroth
attr.desc: Might and Magic VII: For Blood and Honor is a role-playing game for Windows published in 1999 by 3DO and developed by New World Computing as part of the science fantasy series Might and Magic. OpenEnroth is a reimplementation which allows you to play MMVII on modern platforms.
attr.inst: Purchase Might and Magic VII on gog.com, or extract the game files from an original Windows CD-ROM. Place the GoG offline installer (setup...exe) or extracted files (DATA etc) in ports/openenroth/gamedata/. If you use the GoG installer, the patcher will extract the files the first time you run the game.
attr.inst_md: Purchase Might and Magic VII on `gog.com`, or extract the game files from an original Windows CD-ROM. Place the GoG offline installer (`setup...exe`) or extracted files (`DATA` etc) in `ports/openenroth/gamedata/`. If you use the GoG installer, the patcher will extract the files the first time you run the game.
